session_info.name: TUYA - Invited Oral Presentations, Hadron Accelerators

papers.title: Linac4: From Initial Design to Final Commissioning
authors: and commissioning effort of CERN's new proton linear accelerator

which has recently been commissioned and which is presently undergoing a reliability run. Linac4 will be connected to the LHC proton injector chain during the next long LHC shut down (LS2) and will then replace the ageing Linac2.
